description: Travelpayouts Data API – the way to get travel insights for your site or blog. Get flight price trends and find popular destinations for your customers.

blocks.name: flightPriceHistory
blocks.description: Brings back the list of prices found by our users during the most recent 48 hours according to the filters used.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: currency
args.info: The airline ticket’s The default value - RUB.

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: destination
args.info: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: beginningOfPeriod
args.info: The beginning of the period, within which the dates of departure fall (in the YYYY-MM-DD format, for example, 2016-05-01). Must be specified if period_type is equal to month.

args.name: periodType
args.info: The period for which the tickets have been found.

args.name: oneWay
args.info: true - one way, false - back-to-back. The default value - false.

args.name: page
args.info: A page number. The default value - 1.

args.name: limit
args.info: The total number of records on a page. The default value - 30. The maximum value - 1000.

args.name: showToAffiliates
args.info: false - all the prices, true - just the prices, found using the partner marker (recommended). The default value - true.

args.name: sorting
args.info: The assorting of prices.

args.name: tripDuration
args.info: The length of stay in weeks or days (for period_type=day).

blocks.name: getPricesForMonth
blocks.description: Brings back the prices for each day of a month, grouped together by number of transfers.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: currency
args.info: The airline ticket’s The default value - RUB.

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: destination
args.info: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: month
args.info: The beginning of the month in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

args.name: showToAffiliates
args.info: false - all the prices, true - just the prices, found using the partner marker (recommended). The default value - true.

blocks.name: getPricesForAlternativeDirections
blocks.description: Brings back the prices for the directions between the nearest to the target cities.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: currency
args.info: The airline ticket’s The default value - RUB.

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: destination
args.info: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of variants entered, from 1 to 20, where 1 is just the variant with the specified points of departure and the points of destination.

args.name: showToAffiliates
args.info: false - all the prices, true - just the prices, found using the partner marker (recommended). The default value - true.

args.name: departDate
args.info: Month of departure (yyyy-mm).

args.name: returnDate
args.info: Month of return (yyyy-mm).

args.name: flexibility
args.info: expansion of the range of dates upward or downward. The value may vary from 0 to 7, where 0 shall show the variants for the dates specified and 7 shall show all the variants found for a week prior to the specified dates and a week after.

args.name: distance
args.info: The number of variants entered, from 1 to 20, where 1 is just the variant with the specified points of departure and the points of destination.

blocks.name: getCheapestTickets
blocks.description: Returns the cheapest non-stop tickets, as well as tickets with 1 or 2 stops, for the selected route with departure/return date filters.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: currency
args.info: The airline ticket’s The default value - RUB.

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: destination
args.info: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of variants entered, from 1 to 20, where 1 is just the variant with the specified points of departure and the points of destination.

args.name: showToAffiliates
args.info: false - all the prices, true - just the prices, found using the partner marker (recommended). The default value - true.

args.name: departDate
args.info: Month of departure (yyyy-mm).

args.name: returnDate
args.info: Month of return (yyyy-mm).

args.name: flexibility
args.info: expansion of the range of dates upward or downward. The value may vary from 0 to 7, where 0 shall show the variants for the dates specified and 7 shall show all the variants found for a week prior to the specified dates and a week after.

args.name: distance
args.info: The number of variants entered, from 1 to 20, where 1 is just the variant with the specified points of departure and the points of destination.

args.name: page
args.info: Display the found data (by default the page displays 100 found prices. If the destination isn't selected, there can be more data. In this case, use the page, to display the next set of data, for example, page=2).

blocks.name: getCheapestTicketsGroupedByMonth
blocks.description: Returns the cheapest non-stop tickets, as well as tickets with 1 or 2 stops, for the selected route grouped by month.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: currency
args.info: The airline ticket’s The default value - RUB.

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: destination
args.info: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

blocks.name: getNonStopTickets
blocks.description: Returns the cheapest non-stop ticket for the selected route with departure/return date filters.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: currency
args.info: The airline ticket’s The default value - RUB.

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: destination
args.info: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: departDate
args.info: Month of departure (yyyy-mm).

args.name: returnDate
args.info: Month of return (yyyy-mm).

blocks.name: getFlightPriceTrends
blocks.description: Returns the cheapest non-stop, one-stop, and two-stop flights for the selected route for each day of the selected month.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: destination
args.info: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: departDate
args.info: Month of departure (yyyy-mm).

args.name: returnDate
args.info: Month of return (yyyy-mm).

args.name: calendarType
args.info: Field used to build the calendar. Equal to either: departure_date or return_date

args.name: length
args.info: Length of stay in the destination city.

args.name: currency
args.info: The airline ticket’s The default value - RUB.

blocks.name: getPopulaAirlinesRoutes
blocks.description: Returns routes for which an airline operates flights, sorted by popularity.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.

args.name: airlineCode
args.info: IATA code of airline.

args.name: limit
args.info: Records limit per page. Default value is 100. Not less than 1000.

args.name: currency

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.name: showToAffiliates
args.info: false - all the prices, true - just the prices, found using the partner marker (recommended). The default value - true.

args.name: departDate

args.name: origin
args.info: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code. The length - from 2 to 3 symbols.

args.info: Individual affiliate token.

blocks.description: Returns a file with a list of airports from the database.

args.info: Individual affiliate token.

blocks.name: getUserDefinitionByIp
blocks.description: Returns the IATA code and the name of the city nearest to the user.

args.name: locale
args.info: The language in which the name of the city is returned (available languages: en, ru, de, fr, it, pl, th. By default, it is Russian)

args.name: callback
args.info: Specifies the name of the function that contains a response to a query (mandatory).

args.name: ip
args.info: IP addresses of the users (if the address is not passed, the system determines the IP from the header of the request).

blocks.name: getEchangeRate
blocks.description: Brings back the current rate of all popular currencies to RUB.

blocks.name: getSpecialOffers
blocks.description: Brings back the recent special offers from the airline companies.

args.name: token
args.info: Individual affiliate token.
